edge: Madhav and Payal fell in love during college, lived together for 5 years until Payal left suddenly. Their relationship is a key focus of the plot.
Maddy's friends advise him to move on from Payal, but he continues his search for her.
After leaving Maddy, Payal is missed and sought after by Maddy. They reconcile before Payal's death.
Payal is dying of cancer when Maddy finds her again, leading to their emotional reunion and eventual deaths.
